sources.title: The Mysterious Mr. Wong
sources.description: Title: The Mysterious Mr. Wong Summary: Investigating a series of murders in Chinatown, wise-guy reporter Jason Barton is captured by the megalomaniacal Mr. Wong, desperately trying to complete his collection of the twelve gold ... Directed by: William Nigh Actors: Bela Lugosi, Wallace Ford, Arline Judge Production Company: Monogram Pictures Release Date: 22 December 1934 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Investigating a series of murders in Chinatown, wise-guy reporter Jason Barton is captured by the megalomaniacal Mr. Wong, desperately trying to complete his collection of the twelve gold coins of Confucius, with which he will be able to acquire the power to become ruler of a large province in China.

sources.title: Mysterious Mr. Wong, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Mysterious Mr. Wong, The
sources.description: Taken form IMDB : Investigating a series of murders in Chinatown, wise-guy reporter Jason Barton is captured by the megalomaniacal Mr. Wong, desperately trying to complete his collection of the twelve gold coins of Confucius, with which he will be able to acquire the power to become ruler of a large province in China.

sources.title: The Mysterious Mr. Wong (1934)
sources.description: Mr. Wong is a "harmless" Chinatown shopkeeper by day and relentless blood-thirsty pursuer of the Twelve Coins of Confucius by night. With possession of the coins, Mr. Wong will be supreme ruler of the Chinese province of Keelat, and his evil destiny will be fulfilled. A killing spree follows in dark and dangerous Chinatown as Wong gets control of 11 of the 12 coins. Reporter Jason Barton and his girl Peg are hot on his trail, but soon find themselves in serious trouble when they stumble onto Wong's headquarters. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-mysterious-mr-wong-1934/

sources.title: Mysterious Mr. Wong (1934) BELA LUGOSI
sources.description:
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Wallace Ford, Arline Judge
Director: William Nigh

A wise-guy reporter is captured by the megalomaniacal Mr. Wong, who is desperately trying become ruler of a large province in China!

sources.title: The Mysterious Mr. Wong (1934) Bela Lugosi | Mystery Movie
sources.description:
Out of the night creeps a shadow, striking terror into the heart of Chinatown! 
Investigating a series of murders in Chinatown, wise-guy reporter Jason Barton is captured by the megalomaniacal Mr. Wong, desperately trying to complete his collection of the twelve gold coins of Confucius, with which he will be able to acquire the power to become ruler of a large province in China, which will bring him great power.

Original title: The Mysterious Mr. Wong (1934) 


Director: William Nigh
Writers: Harry Stephen Keeler, Lew Levenson, Nina Howatt
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Wallace Ford, Arline Judge 
Genres: Mystery


00:00 Full length movie.
02:45 Uncovering a series of mysterious events involving a dangerous plot and a sinister character.
18:57 Investigation into a mysterious ticket and ancient coins leads to a cryptic message and potential danger.
30:34 A mysterious investigation involving a missing coin and a dragon ring unfolds in a restaurant.
31:41 Investigation into a mysterious figure named Wong linked to a murder case unfolds in Chinatown.
39:13 A mysterious encounter in Chinatown leads to danger and intrigue for a couple.
44:54 Mysterious encounter with secret service agent in a strange house leads to dangerous discoveries.
55:19 Intriguing events unfold as a secret agent seeks a mysterious coin, leading to unexpected encounters.
